T02D2111:149b-0: @149b / skyabs 'gro sems bskyad dbang bzhi'i gdams pa bzhugs//
T02D2111:150a-0: @150a * // da ni smon 'jug gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2111:150a-1: de la yang dang por sdig pa bshags par bya ba ni /
T02D2111:150a-3: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skyes ba nas da
T02D2111:150a-4: lta'i lus 'di blangs pa tshun chad mi dge ba'i
T02D2111:150a-7: bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba rnams bla ma dkon mchog yid dam /
T02D2111:150a-8: mkha' 'gro'i spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so //
T02D2111:150a-10: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la thug gi bar di /
T02D2111:150a-11: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2111:150a-14: da ni sdom pa gzung ste /
T02D2111:150a-15: bla ma dkon mchog gi spyan sngar //
T02D2111:150a-16: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2111:150a-17: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2111:150a-18: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2111:150a-19: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2111:150a-20: bdag gis rtag par gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2111:150a-21: de ni smon pa'i sems bskyed de /
T02D2111:150a-23: dang po bshags pa bya ste /
T02D2111:150a-24: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2111:150a-25: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba thog ma
T02D2111:150a-26: med pa nas da lta'i sku 'di blangs pa yan
T02D2111:150a-27: chad du mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang /
T02D2111:150a-29: gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba rnams /
T02D2111:150a-30: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so //
T02D2111:150a-31: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub
T02D2111:150a-32: la thug gi bar du bla ma la skyabs su
T02D2111:150a-33: mchi'o // yi dam la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2111:150a-35: da ni sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2111:150a-36: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2111:150a-37: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum //
T02D2111:150a-38: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2111:150a-39: nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo //
T02D2111:150a-40: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2111:150a-41: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2111:150a-42: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2111:150a-43: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2111:150a-44: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2111:150a-45: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2111:150a-46: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D2111:150a-47: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D2111:150a-48: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D2111:150a-49: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02D2111:150a-50: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D2111:150a-51: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2111:150b-0: las kyi @150b rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2111:150b-1: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2111:150b-2: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2111:150b-3: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2111:150b-4: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D2111:150b-5: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2111:150b-6: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2111:150b-7: bdag gis sdom pa lus gzung //
T02D2111:150b-8: ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis sgrol //
T02D2111:150b-9: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D2111:150b-10: dbugs ma byin pa dbyugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2111:150b-11: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2111:150b-13: nub dang po la smon 'jug gi sems bskyed do //
T02D2111:150b-14: so shing dor la rang re'i rmi lam brtag go //
T02D2111:150b-15: de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste //
T02D2111:150b-16: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa bya ba ni /
T02D2111:150b-17: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02D2111:150b-18: aom badzra t'ikshna du:kha tstshe da pradzny'a dzny'a na m'u rta ye /
T02D2111:150b-19: dzny'a na k'a ya w'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma:/
T02D2111:150b-20: aa a'a sarba ta th'a la sogs pa la thams cad pa'i bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2111:150b-21: nub gnyis pa la byang chub lam du drang ba ni ;
T02D2111:150b-22: mig ras kyis bka' la lag tu me tog thogs la /
T02D2111:150b-23: sgo'i phyi logs su bzhag la /
T02D2111:150b-24: slob dpon nyid kyis 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2111:150b-25: skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyod //
T02D2111:150b-26: dang dang mos pa ci la dga' //
T02D2111:150b-29: bdag cag 'khor ba las bsgral phyir //
T02D2111:150b-30: kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can //
T02D2111:150b-31: srid pa'i 'khor lo gnas sbyor ba //
T02D2111:150b-32: di rang bshad pa'i rin chen gyis //
T02D2111:150b-33: gtso bos bdag la bka' drin gsol //
T02D2111:150b-36: ma rig rmongs pa'i bu mchog khyod //
T02D2111:150b-37: rdo rje byang chub lam nas drangs nas ni //
T02D2111:150b-38: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pas bya //
T02D2111:150b-39: bla med byang chub lam nas drang bar bya'o //
T02D2111:150b-40: badzra aam ku sha dza zhes brjod pas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi bgegs bskrad do //
T02D2111:150b-41: de nas las kyi slob dpon lag tu rdo rje gtad la /
T02D2111:150b-42: lag pa nas drangs nas gral so sor bya'o//
T02D2111:150b-43: rang gi gdong g-yogs byas la gzhag go //
T02D2111:150b-44: yang slob dpon kho rang gis /
T02D2111:150b-45: skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyed //
T02D2111:150b-46: las dang spyod pa ci la dga' //
T02D2111:150b-49: bdag ni skal ldan bde chen la //
T02D2111:151a-1: me tog lag tu thogs la /
T02D2111:151a-2: thal mo sbyar la 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2111:151a-3: byang chub rdo rje 'jam dpal la //
T02D2111:151a-4: rin chen me tog dam pa 'bul //
T02D2111:151a-5: bdag kyang 'jam dpal skur gyur cig /'jam dpal sku yi rdo rje gsol //
T02D2111:151a-6: pra t'i tstsha ho zhes me tog dbul lo //
T02D2111:151a-7: me tog lha la tshud na des chog go //
T02D2111:151a-8: ma tshud na lan gsum bskyar ro //
T02D2111:151a-9: de yang ma tshud na las thams cad bskyar ro //
T02D2111:151a-10: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod do //
T02D2111:151a-11: di ring dang ba'i shugs kyis ni //
T02D2111:151a-12: dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan par bya //
T02D2111:151a-13: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2111:151a-14: dam tshig mchog tu gyur par byed//
T02D2111:151a-15: badzra tsakshu pra be sha phat ces mig dbye'o //
T02D2111:151a-17: dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur te bdag gi thugs
T02D2111:151a-18: ka nas 'od 'phros pas bum pa 'od du zhu
T02D2111:151a-22: de la rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D2111:151a-23: de spyi bo'i thog tu bzhag la mchod pa dbul te /
T02D2111:151a-24: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02D2111:151a-25: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02D2111:151a-26: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
T02D2111:151a-27: nyon mongs kun gyi sgra che ba //
T02D2111:151a-28: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
T02D2111:151a-29: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
T02D2111:151a-30: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
T02D2111:151a-31: khro ba chen po sgra che ba //
T02D2111:151a-32: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
T02D2111:151a-33: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
T02D2111:151a-40: aom badzra t'ishna du:kha tstshe da pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta
T02D2111:151a-41: ye dzny'a na k'a ya w'a g'i shva ra aa
T02D2111:151a-42: ra pa tsa n'a ya ten ma:aa a'a ai a'i
T02D2111:151a-43: au a'u ae aee ao aoo aam aa:sthi to hri
T02D2111:151a-44: di / dzny'a na m'urti ra hi buddho buddh'a n'am
T02D2111:151a-45: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta la sogs pa
T02D2111:151a-46: las thams cad pa'i sngags btang /
T02D2111:151a-47: de ni bum pa'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D2111:151a-48: de nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur te /
T02D2111:151a-49: dbu rgyan dang cod pan mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2111:151a-50: bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od kha dog lnga 'phros te /
T02D2111:151a-51: dbu rgyan dang cod pan 'od du zhu rin po che'i sul mangs cig tu gyur /
T02D2111:151a-52: rin po che 'od du zhu bas /
T02D2111:151a-53: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbang ngo //
T02D2111:151a-54: slob ma'i mgo la bskon la /
T02D2111:151a-55: gong gi mchod pas mchod do //
T02D2111:151a-56: de nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur te rdo rje las
T02D2111:151a-57: 'od 'phros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu nas padma
T02D2111:151a-59: padma de zhu bas aam du gyur /
T02D2111:151b-0: @151b aam zhu bas snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D2111:151b-1: de slob ma'i lag tu bzhag pas mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2111:151b-2: de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te /
T02D2111:151b-3: slob dpon gyi mdun du dril bu bzhag la thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas dril bu zhu /
T02D2111:151b-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig tu gyur /
T02D2111:151b-5: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ha cig tu gyur /
T02D2111:151b-6: de las don yod grub pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D2111:151b-7: dril bu slob ma'i lag tu bzhag la mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2111:151b-8: de nas ming gi dbang bskur te /
T02D2111:151b-9: slob dpon gyi phyag g-yas pa'i steng du thugs ka
T02D2111:151b-10: nas aa de 'od du zhu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2111:151b-11: cig tu gyur / zla ba 'od du zhu aom du gyur /
T02D2111:151b-12: de las rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang ngo //
T02D2111:151b-13: slob dpon gyi phyag slob ma'i spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste /
T02D2111:151b-14: mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2111:151b-15: de ltar dbang bskur ba ni phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te /
T02D2111:151b-16: ye shes lnga'i dbang thob pa'o //
T02D2111:151b-17: des ni bum pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D2111:151b-19: bdag lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la /
T02D2111:151b-20: de'i spyi gtsug tu bla ma bsgom /
T02D2111:151b-21: de'i spyi gtsug tu gshin rje gshed yab yum bsgom /
T02D2111:151b-22: de'i spyi gtsug tu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsgom mo //
T02D2111:151b-23: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad snyoms par zhugs
T02D2111:151b-24: pa'i byang chub kyi sems gshin rje gshed yang yum
T02D2111:151b-26: gshin rje gshed yab yum snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems la babs nas /
T02D2111:151b-27: bla ma yab yum la zhugs par bsam /
T02D2111:151b-28: bla ma yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub
T02D2111:151b-29: kyi sems de dag gi lam du zhugs nas lce
T02D2111:151b-31: aargha dang bsres la slob ma'i lce steng du bzhag la slob ma'i ngag skyon dag par bsam /
T02D2111:151b-35: de rim gyis yar drangs pas ngag gi lam du zhugs /
T02D2111:151b-36: de sna bug g-yas su zhugs /
T02D2111:151b-38: ngag rlung ni 'gro 'od bzlas pa byas pas sgra
T02D2111:151b-39: ngos gzung med pas ngag gi sgra grag stong du
T02D2111:151b-41: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni /
T02D2111:151b-42: rnal 'byor pa g-yas su gzhag / rnal 'byor ma
T02D2111:151b-43: g-yon du gzhag / de nas slob dpon gyis rdo
T02D2111:151b-44: rje dang dril bu mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2111:151b-45: gshin rje gshed yab yum du bskyed do //
T02D2111:151b-46: rdo rje de la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od
T02D2111:151b-47: zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu 'od zer
T02D2111:152a-0: @152a * // gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul /
T02D2111:152a-1: slar 'dus pas yi ge h'um cig tu gyur /
T02D2111:152a-2: h'um 'od du zhu ba las 'jam dpal gshin rje
T02D2111:152a-3: gshed sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D2111:152a-5: g-yon sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa bcas pa /
T02D2111:152a-7: zhing chen g-yang gzhi stag gi sham thabs dang /
T02D2111:152a-8: sprul gyi chun po dang thod pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2111:152a-9: dur khrod kyi chas can du bskyed la slob ma'i thugs kar bzhag la /
T02D2111:152a-10: ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya'o //
T02D2111:152a-11: de nas rdo rje de slob ma'i lag tu gtad thabs kyi rang bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02D2111:152a-12: dril bu la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas dril bu 'od du zhu /
T02D2111:152a-13: dril bu'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul /
T02D2111:152a-14: tshur 'dus pas yi ge aa cig tu gyur /
T02D2111:152a-15: aa de 'od du zhu ba las rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo /
T02D2111:152a-16: g-yas gri gug / g-yon thod pa bsnams pa cig
T02D2111:152a-17: tu bskyed la slob ma'i spyi bo thog tu bzhag
T02D2111:152a-18: la ye shes dgug gzhug bya'o //
T02D2111:152a-19: de bu'i 'od kyis rig mar bsgom mo //
T02D2111:152a-20: de ltar shes rab kyis rim par bu'i 'od kyis rig mar bsgom mo //
T02D2111:152a-21: de ltar shes rab kyis rim par dbang bskur ro //
T02D2111:152a-22: de nas slob dpon gyis mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab /
T02D2111:152a-23: slob dpon gyi gsang ba'i gnas nas h'um cig 'phros pas slob ma'i gsang bar thim /
T02D2111:152a-24: rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyed pa cig tu gyur /
T02D2111:152a-25: rdo rje'i bum par aom gyis mtshan pa cig tu gyur par bsgom /
T02D2111:152a-26: yum gyi mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab ste /
T02D2111:152a-27: bdag gi yum gyi mkha' las ma dmar mo cig 'phros pas slob ma'i yum gyi gsang bar thim /
T02D2111:152a-28: ma de 'od du zhu ba las padma 'dang ma brgyad ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa cig bsgom //
T02D2111:152a-29: de nas slob dpon gyis h'um zhes brjod pas rdo rje bskul /
T02D2111:152a-31: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2111:152a-33: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga w'a na /
T02D2111:152a-34: dzny'a na m'urti w'a g'i shva ra ma h'a pa tsa /
T02D2111:152a-36: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu
T02D2111:152a-37: dzny'a na garbha aa:zhes pas skad cig ma la bskyed
T02D2111:152a-38: de / bde ba ngos bzung ngo //
T02D2111:152a-39: de ni bde ba bskur ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2111:152a-40: dbang gi don lam du bslang ba ni /
T02D2111:152b-0: de'i dus las ma g-yos par yab @152b yum gnyis
T02D2111:152b-1: kyi bsrubs pas rlung ma'i drod can gyi me lce
T02D2111:152b-2: aa ba dh'u t'i na yar zhugs te /
T02D2111:152b-3: spyi bo gtsug tor gyi ham zhu ba las /
T02D2111:152b-4: klang rgyas bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis grol /
T02D2111:152b-5: de la bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems babs te dga' ba'o //
T02D2111:152b-6: byang chub kyi sems de mgrin pa longs spyod kyi
T02D2111:152b-7: 'khor lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug grol
T02D2111:152b-8: te mchog dga'/ de chos kyi 'khor lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab brgyad grol te dga' bral /
T02D2111:152b-9: de lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du babs rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi grol te /
T02D2111:152b-10: de lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D2111:152b-11: de rang gnas su 'phangs te ha ha zhes pas lte ba nas snying gar drangs /
T02D2111:152b-12: hi hi zhes pas snying gnas mgrin par drangs /
T02D2111:152b-13: h'um h'um zhes pas mgrin pa nas klad pa bde
T02D2111:152b-14: chen du drangs pas gtsug tor chen po'i ham la
T02D2111:152b-15: spur len la spur 'dus pa'am khab len la lcags
T02D2111:152b-16: 'dus pa bzhin du 'u ba kyis 'dus so //
T02D2111:152b-17: de la seng ge rnam par rol gyi khyab par bsgom mo //
T02D2111:152b-18: de ltar yar drangs mar dbab byed kyin bde stong gi nyams ngos zin par bya'o //
T02D2111:152b-19: dbang bzhi pa ni bzhi par ming btags kyang gsum las bskur bar mi 'dod do //
T02D2111:152b-20: gong ma'i nyams de sems nyid la ngo sprod pa la bzhi las shes zer ro //
T02D2111:152b-21: del bzhi pa'i dbang gi ngo sprad de /
T02D2111:152b-22: gdams ngag ngo sprad kyis sems ngos zung shig bya /
T02D2111:152b-24: de ka rang yin byas la /
T02D2111:152b-25: lag pa nam mkha' la yug byas la /
T02D2111:152b-26: bzhi pa bde ba'i don no //
T02D2111:152b-27: phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes
T02D2111:152b-28: de gzugs kha dog tu ma grub pas nam mkha'
T02D2111:152b-30: gsum pa'i nyams de ngos gzung dang bral bas /
T02D2111:152b-31: gzhon nu ma'i bde ba nyams su myong du yod
T02D2111:152b-32: pa la dngos po mngon sum du bstan du med
T02D2111:152b-33: / de ka la ngo sprad pas dbang bzhi pa'i gdams ngag go //
T02D2111:152b-34: lta stangs bzhis rigs pa spros pa dang bral bar ngo sprad do //
T02D2111:152b-35: bum pa'i dbang gi dus su rigs lnga'i bkra shis gsol zhing dbang bskur /
T02D2111:152b-36: gsang dbang man chad dbang bzhi pa rdzogs nas bkra shis kyi dbang bskur te dngos grub blang ngo //
T02D2111:152b-39: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:152b-40: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02D2111:153a-1: bkra shis kyi ston mo ni /
T02D2111:153a-9: zas sna mang du thogs la rigs lnga'i bkra shis gsol te /
T02D2111:153a-10: bkra shis ngam pa chos dbyings bskyong pa med mod kyang //
T02D2111:153a-11: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bkra shis bde legs shog / bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153a-12: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / dbus phyogs sangs rgyas rigs kyi zhing khams nas //
T02D2111:153a-13: spros dang bral ba'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02D2111:153a-14: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs
T02D2111:153a-15: shog / shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi zhing khams
T02D2111:153a-16: nas / rdo rje rigs kyi bkra shis skye 'chi med //
T02D2111:153a-17: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153a-18: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi zhing khams nas //
T02D2111:153a-19: rin chen rigs kyi bkra shis dgos 'dod 'byung //
T02D2111:153a-20: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153a-21: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / nub phyogs padma rigs kyi zhing khams nas //
T02D2111:153a-22: skyon med padma lta bu'i bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153a-23: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153a-24: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi zhing khams nas //
T02D2111:153a-25: las rnams grub pa'i bkra shis gang legs pa //
T02D2111:153a-26: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs
T02D2111:153a-27: shog / aom buddha k'a la sha aa bhi shinytsa
T02D2111:153a-28: aom // aom badzra k'a la sha aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2111:153a-29: aom ratna k'a la sha aa bhi shinyatsi t'am /
T02D2111:153a-30: aom padma k'a la sha aa bhi shinytsa hr'i /
T02D2111:153a-31: aom karma k'a la sha aa bhi shinytsa a'a: //
T02D2111:153a-32: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis
T02D2111:153a-33: brgyan pa rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bkra shis pa de
T02D2111:153a-34: bzhin du / bdag cag dpon slob bkra shis par
T02D2111:153a-35: gyur cig / bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyi bkra shis
T02D2111:153a-36: bzhin du / ni / bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153a-37: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
T02D2111:153a-38: sangs rgyas sku yi bkra shis shog / chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
T02D2111:153a-39: buddha gsung gi bkra shis shog /'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
T02D2111:153b-0: buddha thugs kyi bkra shis shog / khyab bdag chen po rin @153b chen gdugs //
T02D2111:153b-1: buddha dbu yi bkra shis shog / spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
T02D2111:153b-2: buddha spyan gyi bkra shis shog / bum pa bzang
T02D2111:153b-3: po che ba'i mchog / buddha mgul gyi bkra shis
T02D2111:153b-4: shog / nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba //
T02D2111:153b-5: buddha ljags kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2111:153b-6: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
T02D2111:153b-7: sangs rgyas zhabs kyi bkra shis shog / skyabs 'gro
T02D2111:153b-8: sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa slob dpon sdom pa
